keywords: heart, breathing, chest, cardiac arrest, moyo, pumzi, kifua

steps.text_en: Check for responsiveness. Shake shoulders and shout 'Are you okay?'
steps.text_sw: Angalia kama anaitikia. Tikisa mabega na uliza kwa sauti 'Uko sawa?'

steps.text_en: Call 999 or 112 immediately if no response.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999 au 112 mara moja kama haitiki.

steps.text_en: Place heel of hand on center of chest. Interlock fingers.
steps.text_sw: Weka kisigino cha mkono katikati ya kifua. Unganisha vidole.

steps.text_en: Push hard and fast. 100-120 compressions per minute. Compress at least 2 inches deep.
steps.text_sw: Bonyeza kwa nguvu na haraka. Migandamizo 100-120 kwa dakika. Bonyeza kirefu cha inchi 2.

steps.text_en: Continue until help arrives or person starts breathing.
steps.text_sw: Endelea hadi msaada ufike au mtu aanze kupumua.

description_sw: Maelekezo ya hatua kwa hatua ya CPR kwa watu wazima.

keywords: child, kid, breathing, heart, mtoto, pumzi, moyo

steps.text_en: Check for responsiveness. Tap shoulder gently and call their name.
steps.text_sw: Angalia kama anaitikia. Gusa bega pole na mwite kwa jina.

steps.text_en: Call 999 or 112 immediately if no response.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999 au 112 mara moja kama haitiki.

steps.text_en: Use one or two hands on center of chest. Use less force than adult CPR.
steps.text_sw: Tumia mkono mmoja au miwili katikati ya kifua. Tumia nguvu kidogo kuliko CPR ya wazima.

steps.text_en: Compress about 2 inches deep at 100-120 per minute.
steps.text_sw: Bonyeza kirefu cha inchi 2 kwa kasi ya 100-120 kwa dakika.

description_en: CPR instructions for children aged 1-8 years.
description_sw: Maelekezo ya CPR kwa watoto wa miaka 1-8.

keywords: baby, infant, newborn, mtoto mchanga, pumzi

steps.text_en: Check for responsiveness. Tap foot gently.
steps.text_sw: Angalia kama anaitikia. Gusa mguu pole.

steps.text_en: Call 999 or 112 immediately if no response.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999 au 112 mara moja kama haitiki.

steps.text_en: Use two fingers on center of chest, just below nipple line.
steps.text_sw: Tumia vidole viwili katikati ya kifua, chini kidogo ya mistari ya chuchu.

steps.text_en: Compress about 1.5 inches deep at 100-120 per minute.
steps.text_sw: Bonyeza kirefu cha inchi 1.5 kwa kasi ya 100-120 kwa dakika.

description_en: CPR instructions for infants under 1 year.
description_sw: Maelekezo ya CPR kwa watoto wachanga chini ya mwaka 1.

keywords: choking, airway, coughing, kunasa, kukohoa, hewa

steps.text_en: Ask 'Are you choking?' If they can't speak or cough, act immediately.
steps.text_sw: Uliza 'Unanasa?' Kama hawawezi kusema au kukohoa, fanya haraka.

steps.text_en: Stand behind them. Make a fist above their navel.
steps.text_sw: Simama nyuma yao. Fanya ngumi juu ya kitovu.
Toa misukumo 5 ya haraka kuelekea juu (Heimlich).

steps.text_en: Repeat until object comes out or person becomes unconscious.
steps.text_sw: Rudia hadi kitu kitoke au mtu apoteze fahamu.

steps.text_en: If unconscious, start CPR and call 999/112.
steps.text_sw: Kama amepoteza fahamu, anza CPR na piga 999/112.

description_en: First aid for a choking adult.
description_sw: Huduma ya kwanza kwa mtu mzima anayenasa.

keywords: child choking, baby, infant, mtoto kunasa

steps.text_en: For infant: Give 5 back blows between shoulder blades with heel of hand.
steps.text_sw: Kwa mtoto mchanga: Toa mapigo 5 ya mgongo kati ya mabega kwa kisigino.

steps.text_en: Turn infant face up. Give 5 chest thrusts with two fingers.
steps.text_sw: Geuza mtoto uso juu. Toa misukumo 5 ya kifua kwa vidole viwili.

steps.text_en: For child: Use modified Heimlich with less force.
steps.text_sw: Kwa mtoto: Tumia Heimlich iliyobadilishwa kwa nguvu kidogo.

steps.text_en: Call 999/112 immediately if object doesn't come out.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112 mara moja kama kitu hakitoki.

description_en: First aid for a choking child or infant.
description_sw: Huduma ya kwanza kwa mtoto au mchanga anayenasa.

keywords: chest pain, heart, cardiac, maumivu ya kifua, moyo

steps.text_en: Have person sit down and rest. Loosen tight clothing.
steps.text_sw: Mwambie mtu aketi na apumzike. Legeza nguo zinazobana.

steps.text_en: Give aspirin if available and person is not allergic (chew, don't swallow).
steps.text_sw: Toa aspirini kama ipo na mtu hana mzio (tafuna, usimeze).

steps.text_en: Monitor breathing. Be ready to perform CPR if needed.
steps.text_sw: Angalia upumuaji. Kuwa tayari kufanya CPR ikihitajika.

description_en: Signs of a heart attack and immediate actions.
description_sw: Dalili za mshtuko wa moyo na hatua za haraka.

keywords: stroke, paralysis, face drooping, kiharusi, kupooza

steps.text_en: Remember FAST: Face drooping, Arm weakness, Speech difficulty, Time to call 999/112.
steps.text_sw: Kumbuka FAST: Uso kupooza, Mkono kulegea, Usemi ugumu, Wakati wa kupiga 999/112.

steps.text_en: Call 999/112 immediately. Note the time symptoms started.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112 mara moja. Kumbuka wakati dalili zilianza.

steps.text_en: Keep person calm and lying down with head slightly elevated.
steps.text_sw: Mwambie mtu atulie na alale na kichwa kikiwa juu kidogo.

steps.text_en: Do NOT give food, drink, or medication.

description_en: Identifying a stroke using FAST and what to do.
description_sw: Kutambua kiharusi kwa kutumia FAST na nini cha kufanya.

keywords: blood, cut, wound, hemorrhage, damu, kidonda, jeraha

steps.text_en: Call 999/112 if bleeding is severe or won't stop.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112 kama damu inatoka sana au haachi.

steps.text_en: Apply direct pressure to the wound with a clean cloth or bandage.
steps.text_sw: Bonyeza kidonda moja kwa moja na kitambaa safi au bendeji.

steps.text_en: Keep pressure for at least 10 minutes. Do not remove the cloth.
steps.text_sw: Endelea kubonyeza kwa dakika 10. Usitoe kitambaa.

steps.text_en: If blood soaks through, add more cloth on top. Don't remove the first one.
steps.text_sw: Kama damu inapenya, ongeza kitambaa juu. Usitoe cha kwanza.

steps.text_en: Elevate the injured area above heart level if possible.
steps.text_sw: Inua sehemu iliyoumia juu ya kiwango cha moyo ikiwezekana.

description_sw: Jinsi ya kuzuia kutokwa na damu sana.

keywords: allergy, swelling, breathing, anaphylaxis, mzio, uvimbe, pumzi

steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112 mara moja. Hii ni hatari ya maisha.

steps.text_en: Use EpiPen/epinephrine auto-injector if available. Inject into outer thigh.
steps.text_sw: Tumia EpiPen/sindano ya epinephrine kama ipo. Dondoa paja la nje.

steps.text_en: Have person lie down with legs elevated.
steps.text_sw: Mwambie mtu alale na miguu ikiwa juu.

steps.text_en: Monitor breathing. Be ready to perform CPR if needed.
steps.text_sw: Angalia upumuaji. Kuwa tayari kufanya CPR ikihitajika.

description_en: Emergency treatment for severe allergic reactions.
description_sw: Matibabu ya dharura kwa mzio mkubwa.

keywords: water, drowning, swimming, maji, kuzama, kuogelea

steps.text_en: Get person out of water safely. Don't put yourself at risk.
steps.text_sw: Toa mtu majini kwa usalama. Usijiweke hatarini.

steps.text_en: Check for breathing. If not breathing, start CPR immediately.
steps.text_sw: Angalia upumuaji. Kama hapumui, anza CPR mara moja.

steps.text_en: Remove wet clothing and keep person warm.
steps.text_sw: Toa nguo zilizolowa na mweke mtu mahali pa joto.

description_en: Rescue and first aid for drowning victims.
description_sw: Uokoaji na huduma ya kwanza kwa waliozama.

keywords: burn, fire, hot, scald, moto, kuchoma, maji moto

steps.text_en: Remove person from heat source. Stop the burning process.
steps.text_sw: Toa mtu kutoka chanzo cha joto. Simamisha mchakato wa kuchoma.

steps.text_en: Cool the burn with cool (not ice cold) running water for 10-20 minutes.
steps.text_sw: Pooza kwa maji ya kawaida (si baridi sana) kwa dakika 10-20.

steps.text_en: Remove jewelry and tight clothing before swelling starts.
steps.text_sw: Toa vito na nguo zinazobana kabla ya uvimbe kuanza.

steps.text_en: Cover with sterile, non-stick bandage. Do NOT apply ice, butter, or ointments.
steps.text_sw: Funika na bendeji safi. USITUMIE barafu, siagi, au malahamu.

steps.text_en: Seek medical help for severe burns (large area, face, hands, or blistering).
steps.text_sw: Tafuta msaada wa daktari kwa maumivu makubwa (eneo kubwa, uso, mikono, au mapafu).

description_en: Treatment for minor and major burns.
description_sw: Matibabu ya maumivu ya moto madogo na makubwa.

steps.text_en: Do NOT move the injured area. Keep it still.
Call 999/112 for severe fractures or if bone is visible.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112 kwa mifupa iliyovunjika vibaya au kama mfupa unaonekana.

steps.text_en: Apply ice pack wrapped in cloth to reduce swelling (20 minutes on, 20 off).
steps.text_sw: Weka barafu iliyofungwa kitambaa kupunguza uvimbe (dakika 20 juu, 20 nje).

steps.text_en: Splint the area if trained. Use rigid materials like cardboard or sticks.
steps.text_sw: Weka splint kama umefunzwa. Tumia vitu vigumu kama karatasi au fimbo.

steps.text_en: Treat for shock. Keep person warm and calm.
steps.text_sw: Tibu mshtuko. Weka mtu mahali pa joto na atulie.

description_sw: Huduma ya kwanza kwa mifupa iliyovunjika.

steps.text_en: Call 999/112 if person is unconscious, vomiting, or confused.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112 kama mtu amepoteza fahamu, anatapika, au ana mkanganyiko.

steps.text_en: Keep person still. Do NOT move if neck injury is suspected.
steps.text_sw: Weka mtu bila kusogea. USIHAMISHA kama unashuku jeraha la shingo.

steps.text_en: Apply ice pack to swollen areas (wrapped in cloth).
steps.text_sw: Weka barafu kwenye maeneo yaliyovimba (imefungwa kitambaa).

steps.text_en: Monitor for symptoms: headache, dizziness, nausea, vision changes.
steps.text_sw: Angalia dalili: maumivu ya kichwa, kizunguzungu, kichefuchefu, mabadiliko ya macho.

steps.text_en: Seek medical attention even if symptoms seem mild.
steps.text_sw: Tafuta msaada wa daktari hata kama dalili zinaonekana nyepesi.

description_en: Signs of concussion and head injury care.
description_sw: Dalili za mtikiso wa ubongo na huduma ya jeraha la kichwa.

steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112 au kituo cha sumu mara moja.

steps.text_en: Try to identify what was swallowed. Keep the container if possible.
steps.text_sw: Jaribu kutambua kilichomezwa. Weka chombo ikiwezekana.

steps.text_en: Do NOT make person vomit unless told to by medical professional.
steps.text_sw: USIMFANYE mtu atapike isipokuwa umwambiwa na mtaalamu wa afya.

steps.text_en: If person is unconscious, turn them on their side.
steps.text_sw: Kama mtu amepoteza fahamu, mgeuze upande.

description_sw: Hatua za haraka kwa ushuku wa sumu.

keywords: snake, bite, venom, nyoka, kuumwa, sumu

steps.text_en: Call 999/112 immediately. All snake bites should be treated as medical emergencies.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112 mara moja. Kuumwa na nyoka yoyote ni dharura ya matibabu.

steps.text_en: Keep person calm and still. Movement spreads venom faster.
steps.text_sw: Weka mtu atulie na bila kusogea. Kusogea kusambaza sumu haraka.

steps.text_en: Remove jewelry and tight clothing near the bite.
steps.text_sw: Toa vito na nguo zinazobana karibu na mahali pa kuumwa.

steps.text_en: Keep bitten area below heart level if possible.
steps.text_sw: Weka sehemu iliyoumwa chini ya kiwango cha moyo ikiwezekana.

steps.text_en: Do NOT cut the wound, apply ice, or use a tourniquet.
steps.text_sw: USIKATA jeraha, weka barafu, au tumia kizuizi cha damu.

description_en: What to do (and not do) for a snake bite.
description_sw: Nini cha kufanya (na kutofanya) kwa kuumwa na nyoka.

steps.text_en: Stay calm. Time the seizure. Call 999/112 if it lasts over 5 minutes.
steps.text_sw: Tulia. Pima muda wa kifafa. Piga 999/112 kama inachukua zaidi ya dakika 5.

steps.text_en: Clear area of hard or sharp objects. Protect their head.
steps.text_sw: Ondoa vitu vigumu au vikali. Linda kichwa chao.

steps.text_en: Do NOT hold person down or put anything in their mouth.
steps.text_sw: USIMSHIKE mtu chini au kuweka kitu kinywani mwao.

steps.text_en: Turn person on their side after seizure stops to help breathing.
steps.text_sw: Mgeuze mtu upande baada ya kifafa kuisha ili kusaidia kupumua.

steps.text_en: Stay with person until fully conscious. Reassure them.
steps.text_sw: Kaa na mtu hadi apate fahamu kamili. Mfariji.

description_en: First aid for seizures and epilepsy.

keywords: shock, pale, weak pulse, mshtuko, rangi kubadilika

steps.text_en: Call 999/112. Shock is a life-threatening condition.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112. Mshtuko ni hali ya hatari ya maisha.

steps.text_en: Have person lie down with legs elevated 12 inches.
steps.text_sw: Mwambie mtu alale na miguu ikiwa juu inchi 12.

steps.text_en: Keep person warm with blanket. Do not overheat.
steps.text_sw: Weka mtu mahali pa joto na blanketi. Usimfanye joto sana.

steps.text_en: Do NOT give food or water.
Monitor breathing and pulse. Be ready to perform CPR.
steps.text_sw: Angalia upumuaji na mapigo ya moyo. Kuwa tayari kufanya CPR.

steps.text_en: Do NOT rub the eye. This can cause more damage.
steps.text_sw: USISUGUE jicho. Hii inaweza kusababisha uharibifu zaidi.

steps.text_en: For chemicals: Flush eye with clean water for 15 minutes.
steps.text_sw: Kwa kemikali: Osha jicho kwa maji safi kwa dakika 15.

steps.text_en: For foreign object: Do NOT try to remove it. Cover eye with cup or cone.
steps.text_sw: Kwa kitu cha kigeni: USIJARIBU kukitoa. Funika jicho na kikombe au koni.

steps.text_en: Seek immediate medical attention for all serious eye injuries.
steps.text_sw: Tafuta msaada wa daktari mara moja kwa majeraha yote makubwa ya jicho.

description_sw: Huduma ya kwanza kwa majeraha ya jicho.

steps.text_en: Wash your hands before treating the wound.
steps.text_sw: Osha mikono yako kabla ya kutibu jeraha.

steps.text_en: Clean wound with clean water. Remove dirt gently.
steps.text_sw: Safisha jeraha kwa maji safi. Toa uchafu pole pole.
Weka dawa ya kuua vijidudu ikipo.

steps.text_en: Cover with sterile bandage. Change daily.
steps.text_sw: Funika na bendeji safi. Badilisha kila siku.

steps.text_en: Watch for signs of infection: redness, swelling, pus, or fever.
steps.text_sw: Angalia dalili za maambukizi: wekundu, uvimbe, usaha, au homa.

steps.text_en: Sit down and lean slightly forward. Do NOT lean back.
steps.text_sw: Keti na inama mbele kidogo. USIINAME nyuma.

steps.text_en: Pinch soft part of nose firmly for 10 minutes.
steps.text_sw: Bana sehemu laini ya pua kwa nguvu kwa dakika 10.

steps.text_en: Breathe through your mouth. Apply ice pack to bridge of nose.
steps.text_sw: Pumua kwa mdomo. Weka barafu kwenye daraja la pua.

steps.text_en: After bleeding stops, avoid blowing nose for several hours.
steps.text_sw: Baada ya damu kuacha, epuka kupuliza pua kwa masaa kadhaa.

steps.text_en: Seek medical help if bleeding continues after 20 minutes.
steps.text_sw: Tafuta msaada wa daktari kama damu inaendelea baada ya dakika 20.

keywords: sprain, strain, ankle, wrist, kulegea, mkono, mguu

steps.text_en: Rest the injured area. Avoid using it.
Ice: Apply ice pack for 20 minutes every 2-3 hours for first 48 hours.
steps.text_sw: Barafu: Weka barafu kwa dakika 20 kila masaa 2-3 kwa masaa 48 ya kwanza.

steps.text_en: Compression: Wrap with elastic bandage. Not too tight.
steps.text_sw: Kubana: Funga kwa bendeji ya elastic. Si kwa nguvu sana.

steps.text_en: Elevation: Keep injured area raised above heart level.
steps.text_sw: Kuinua: Weka sehemu iliyoumia juu ya kiwango cha moyo.

steps.text_en: Seek medical help if severe pain, can't bear weight, or no improvement in 48 hours.
steps.text_sw: Tafuta msaada wa daktari kama maumivu makali, huwezi kubeba uzito, au hakuna maboresho kwa masaa 48.

steps.text_en: If person feels faint: Have them lie down with legs elevated.
steps.text_sw: Kama mtu anahisi kuzimia: Mwambie alale na miguu ikiwa juu.

steps.text_en: If already fainted: Check breathing. Call 999/112 if not breathing.
steps.text_sw: Kama ameshazimia: Angalia upumuaji. Piga 999/112 kama hapumui.

steps.text_en: Loosen tight clothing. Ensure good air circulation.
steps.text_sw: Legeza nguo zinazobana. Hakikisha hewa inazunguka vizuri.

steps.text_en: When conscious, keep lying down for a few minutes before sitting up slowly.
steps.text_sw: Wakati ana fahamu, endelea kulala kwa dakika chache kabla ya kuketi pole pole.

steps.text_en: Seek medical help if fainting is frequent or unexplained.
steps.text_sw: Tafuta msaada wa daktari kama kuzimia ni mara kwa mara au hakuna sababu.

keywords: heat, hot, sun, dehydration, joto, jua, ukosefu wa maji

steps.text_en: Move person to cool, shaded area immediately.
steps.text_sw: Hamisha mtu mahali pa baridi, kivuli mara moja.

steps.text_en: Call 999/112 if person is confused, unconscious, or has very high temperature.
steps.text_sw: Piga 999/112 kama mtu ana mkanganyiko, amepoteza fahamu, au ana joto sana.

steps.text_en: Remove excess clothing. Apply cool, wet cloths to skin.
steps.text_sw: Toa nguo za ziada. Weka vitambaa baridi na vilivyolowa kwenye ngozi.

steps.text_en: Give cool water to drink if person is conscious and can swallow.
steps.text_sw: Toa maji baridi kunywa kama mtu ana fahamu na anaweza kumeza.

steps.text_en: Fan the person. Continue cooling until body temperature drops.
steps.text_sw: Peperusha mtu. Endelea kupooza hadi joto la mwili lishuke.

steps.text_en: Move person to warm, dry place. Call 999/112 if severe.
steps.text_sw: Hamisha mtu mahali pa joto na kavu. Piga 999/112 kama ni kali.

steps.text_en: Remove wet clothing. Replace with dry, warm blankets.
steps.text_sw: Toa nguo zilizolowa. Badilisha na blanketi kavu za joto.

steps.text_en: Cover head and neck. These areas lose heat quickly.
steps.text_sw: Funika kichwa na shingo. Maeneo haya yanapoteza joto haraka.

steps.text_en: Give warm (not hot) drinks if person is conscious. No alcohol.
steps.text_sw: Toa vinywaji vya joto (si moto sana) kama mtu ana fahamu. Hakuna pombe.

steps.text_en: Do NOT use direct heat (heating pads, hot water). Warm gradually.
steps.text_sw: USITUMIE joto la moja kwa moja (pedi za joto, maji moto). Ongeza joto pole pole.

keywords: bee, wasp, mosquito, insect, nyuki, mbu, wadudu

steps.text_en: Remove stinger if visible (scrape, don't pinch).
Wash area with soap and water.
steps.text_sw: Osha eneo kwa sabuni na maji.

steps.text_en: Apply ice pack to reduce swelling and pain.
steps.text_sw: Weka barafu kupunguza uvimbe na maumivu.

steps.text_en: Apply anti-itch cream or take antihistamine if needed.
steps.text_sw: Weka krimu ya kupunguza kuwashwa au chukua dawa ya antihistamine ikihitajika.

steps.text_en: Seek medical help if severe swelling, difficulty breathing, or signs of allergic reaction.
steps.text_sw: Tafuta msaada wa daktari kama uvimbe mkubwa, ugumu wa kupumua, au dalili za mzio.

description_en: Emergency steps for severe asthma attack.
description_sw: Hatua za dharura kwa shambulio kali la pumu.
Matibabu ya sukari ya chini ya damu.

description_en: Managing a seizure lasting longer than 5 minutes.
description_sw: Kudhibiti kifafa kinachodumu zaidi ya dakika 5.

description_en: First aid for chest pain and suspected heart attack.
description_sw: Huduma ya kwanza kwa maumivu ya kifua na ushuku wa mshtuko wa moyo.

description_en: Care for deep cuts and severe bleeding.
description_sw: Huduma kwa majeraha marefu na kutokwa na damu sana.
Matibabu ya maumivu ya moto ya daraja la kwanza.
Huduma ya dharura kwa maumivu makubwa ya moto.

description_en: First aid for a broken arm.
description_sw: Huduma ya kwanza kwa mkono uliovunjika.

description_en: First aid for a broken leg.
description_sw: Huduma ya kwanza kwa mguu uliovunjika.

description_en: How to manage fever at home.

description_sw: Kudhibiti kutapika na kuzuia ukosefu wa maji.

description_en: What to do if you suspect malaria.
Steps to take for suspected typhoid fever.
description_sw: Hatua za kuchukua kwa ushuku wa homa ya matumbo.
Hatua za haraka kwa ushuku wa kipindupindu.

description_en: Emergency steps for bleeding during pregnancy.
description_sw: Hatua za dharura kwa kutokwa na damu wakati wa ujauzito.
Kudhibiti njano nyepesi kwa watoto wachanga.

steps.text_sw: Weka jua la moja kwa moja

description_sw: Msaada kwa maumivu makali ya kichwa.
Dawa za nyumbani kwa maumivu ya jino.
Msaada kwa maumivu makali ya koo.
Kutathmini na kudhibiti maumivu ya tumbo.
Kudhibiti maumivu ya mgongo ya ghafla.

steps.text_sw: Tafuta msaada kama baada ya jeraha

description_sw: Huduma ya jumla kwa upele wa ngozi.
Kunywa maji baada ya ukosefu mdogo wa maji.
Huduma ya kwanza kwa baridi kidogo kuchoma.
Kuzuia na kutibu kichefuchefu cha usafiri.
Hatua za haraka kwa mzio wa chakula.
Msaada kwa maumivu ya moyo/asidi reflux.

description_en: What to do for painful urination.
description_sw: Nini cha kufanya kwa maumivu wakati wa mkojo.

steps.text_sw: Vaa nguo za ndani za pamba

description_sw: Huduma ya haraka kwa maumivu ya korodani.

description_en: Coping with ringing in the ears.

description_sw: Hatua za haraka kwa kuona kwa usikivu.

steps.text_sw: Safisha meno mara mbili kwa siku
Tumia uzi wa meno kila siku
Ona daktari wa meno kama inaendelea

description_sw: Msaada kwa maumivu ya jino la akili.
Huduma ya nyumbani kwa kucha kuingia ndani.

steps.text_sw: Vaa nguo za ndani za pamba
Kanda kwa kitana chenye meno finyu
Osha uso mara mbili kwa siku
Tafuta msaada kama mara kwa mara
